Package com.example.goldencarrot.data.db

Class WaitListRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.goldencarrot.data.db.WaitListRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
WaitListDb
public class WaitListRepository extends Object implements WaitListDb
The WaitListRepository class provides methods to create, update, delete, and query waitlist documents in Firestore. It interacts with Firestore to persist waitlist data such as user names and their status.
